name: Night Friends
description:
We all love friends and followers! Taking togetherness to the extreme, play as a raccoon to find your trashy friends at the dead of night!

Bugs

  • Some of your friends might end up travelling upside down with you, but don’t worry! They are fine! No animals were hurt in the making of the game 
  • Your main raccoon friend might not move properly around the map, but the game still plays!

Team:

Angel Spence-Lewis - @angieoreo

Chris Cox - @papercaves

Manesh Mistry - @mmshm

Buttons

WASD or Directional Pad - to move

Space Bar - to grab
